AI Description: CRISPRitz is a web-based software tool for designing and analyzing CRISPR/Cas9 guide RNAs. It allows users to design guide RNAs for gene knockout, gene editing, and transcriptional activation with high specificity and efficiency.
Core Features: Guide RNA Design For Gene Knockout, Guide RNA Design For Gene Editing, Guide RNA Design For Transcriptional Activation, High Specificity & Efficiency, Web-Based Interface
General Tags: Crispr/Cas9, Guide RNA Design, Genome Editing, Molecular Biology
